events.comment:
Create sliding tile function  [sprite for image Dog, Car, Fish or rove] [anchor x,y are the offset or starting position] [size is the number of columns and rows] [spacing is spacing between tiles]
(images are all royalty free from Pexels.com)

eventsFunctions.name: CreateTiles
eventsFunctions.sentence: Create Sliding Tiles using _PARAM1_ at _PARAM2_ , _PARAM3_ size _PARAM4_ , _PARAM5_ with a spacing of _PARAM6_
